name: anarchy_engine_showcases_desktop
author: S. Panfilov
description: Desktop application for Anarchy Engine showcases

scripts.build: npm run reload-and-prebuild && npm run build:electron --
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.build:linux:appimage: npm run build -- --linux AppImage && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.build:mac:app: npm run build -- --mac --dir && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.build:mac:dmg: npm run build -- --mac dmg && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.build:win:app: npm run build -- --win --dir && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.build:win:nsis: npm run build -- --win nsis && npm run clean:postbuild
scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild:ts && npm run prebuild:preload
scripts.reload-and-prebuild: npm run reload:game-dist && npm run prebuild
scripts.reload:game-dist: npm run clean && npm run copy:game-dist
